channel.title: Wonders of the Multiverse UA
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Wonders of the Multiverse UA"

item.title: Re: Wonders of the Multiverse UA
item.content:encoded: Yeah, thanks for completing these guys. Was meant to get back to them sooner, but as always, IRL stuff gets in the way.

item.title: Re: Wonders of the Multiverse UA
item.content:encoded:
Great job! Thanks for taking care of those.

I'll get the 3 missing feats added to the main page shortly. And I'll work on getting the feats section cleaned up. I've had the same thoughts on the feats page, but just not sure how to fix it. Even without the UA, it's getting unwieldy.

item.title: Re: Wonders of the Multiverse UA
item.content:encoded:

That should be it, the feats complete!

item.title: Re: Wonders of the Multiverse UA
item.content:encoded:
This batch I wanted to leave in a seperate post to highlight that unlike the other ones which received a front page link prior to page creation, these ones did not, and as such still will require a front page link

http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/feat:outlands-envoy-ua
http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/feat:planar-wanderer-ua
http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/feat:righteous-heritor-ua

item.title: Re: Wonders of the Multiverse UA
item.content:encoded: Oh minor side note: The UA and feats section is getting a bit unwiedly I feel, especially with all the old UA. I feel we should move older and non-revised UA into the archived UA section, creating a new Archived Feats section within that, so that the current feat section shows only print feats and new UA, which should make it more easy to work with

item.title: Re: Wonders of the Multiverse UA
item.content:encoded:
Alright lets go, heres a starting batch to show progress:

http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/feat:cohort-of-chaos-ua
http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/feat:ember-of-the-fire-giant-revised-ua
http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/feat:fury-of-the-frost-giant-revised-ua
http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/feat:guile-of-the-cloud-giant-revised-ua
http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/feat:keenness-of-the-stone-giant-revised-ua

Alongside getting them up there, I've implemented a small change in how we usually format feats, in that, feats with prerequisite feats link to the feats they need. This is due to the fact that from information ive read, feats in this style are going to become a definite part of the game in future. This style of linking has been something I've seen or 3.5/pathfinder style websites before.

So yeah, thoughts on that? I think it makes the formatting better. If we like it, I think I'll go and update each other feat that uses prereq feats to link to their prereq. I might also do the same thing for background prerequisites too.

I also wonder if we should do the inverse as well? Another thing I picked up from reading 3.5/path srd's or whatnot, is that it might be a good idea to alongside saying "This is the prerequsite feat (link attachment)", we could also have a "This feat is a prerequisite for these feats", though thats something im more 50/50 in terms of it being a good idea, rather than properly in favour of like the prereq links. Maybe Ill create a test page to show test out and show what it looks like in a bit

In any case, ill be having the next set of feats up soon enough

item.title: Re: Wonders of the Multiverse UA
item.content:encoded: I've been meaning to go and finish these up shortly, hadn't gotten around to it yet due to having a bunch of stuff due IRL and eating up my time, but now that I've got a pocket of air to breathe ill see to them

item.title: Re: Wonders of the Multiverse UA
item.content:encoded: Did anyone ever get around to the remainder of the feats on this? It doesn't look like it based on the links on the main page, but wanted to check.

item.title: Re: Wonders of the Multiverse UA
item.content:encoded:
Thanks for working on this! All the finished pages have been linked on the main page.

I'm going to be out of town all week next week so I went ahead and added links to all the unfinished pages as well (all feats I think). Once those pages are created the links should start working. Just double check the link you create it at with the link on the main page. If it's created correctly the link should change from gray to gold-ish (whatever color most of the links on the main page are).

item.title: Re: Wonders of the Multiverse UA
item.content:encoded:
Pretty cool to see that we might be getting a planescape book :)

Thanks for helping start the work Valkyria

Agent of Order: http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/feat:agent-of-order-ua
Baleful Scion: http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/feat:baleful-scion-ua
Cartomancer: http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/feat:cartomancer-ua

item.title: Wonders of the Multiverse UA
item.content:encoded:
New UA so new content to add! I'll be adding links here as the pages are completed.
https://media.wizards.com/2022/dnd/downloads/UA2022-WondersoftheMultiverse.pdf

Races:
Glitchling - http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/glitchling-ua

Subclasses:
